item.description:
Let's join a varied group of folks interested in northern European culture and language at the Goethe Institut's monthly "Wein Bar" social in their elegant Back Bay townhouse. $15 at the door; includes open wine bar and apps. Goes from 6:00 to 8:00 (or 18:00 to 20:00 if you prefer). I suggest writing "BBB" on the bottom of your name tag to aid in identifying other members of this Meetup.

Thurman Smith

781-729-3832

Â
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my pic, come over and say hello (or 'hallo')

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Socialize at the Goethe
